attributes.action: Scrap the proposed pay-per-mile idea for motorists
attributes.additional_details:
We ask the government to consider the implications such a scheme would cause for every person who has to use a vehicle for work or personal reasons.

This will hit those who rely on using their vehicle the most, such as the self employed or those whose family live a great distance away from each other, while at the same time extracting yet more money from every motorist on the road.
attributes.background: We ask the government to scrap the idea of charging motorists to pay an additional charge for every mile they drive their vehicle.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560867
